fields.Name: Copy cURL request
fields.Description: Can I copy a network request as cURL?

Chrome.Name: Copy cURL request
Chrome.Notes: In the **Network** tab, right click on the request, Copy > Copy as cURL will copy the request with cURL command to the clipboard.

Firefox.Name: Copy cURL request
Firefox.Notes: In the **Network** tab, right click on the request, Copy > Copy as cURL will copy the request with cURL command to the clipboard.

Edge.Name: Copy cURL request
Edge.Notes: In the **Network** tab, right click on the request, Copy > Copy as cURL will copy the request with cURL command to the clipboard.

Safari.Name: Copy cURL request
Safari.Notes: In the **Network** tab, right click on the request, "Copy as cURL" will copy the request with cURL command to the clipboard.

Opera.Name: Copy cURL request
Opera.Notes: In the **Network** tab, right click on the request, Copy > Copy as cURL will copy the request with cURL command to the clipboard.
